website_summaries.verdict: While you're not investing in an heirloom piece here, the quality is actually very good given the price.
pros: Decent quality for an attractive price
The top features an acrylic window for easy viewing and has magnetic locking
Most buyers felt this box was sturdy
cons: Some of these come with a strong odor
let it air out a few days before using it
All-glue construction leads to some boxes falling apart within a few months

customer_reviews.title: Clear top is flimsy but the rest is great
customer_reviews.text: Fits roughly 10 to 12 standard teabags. The clear top piece is plastic and flexible so I wouldn't stack anything heavy on top of it. The purduct is otherwise Sturdy and well made. The individual pockets are solid bamboo and stay perfectly in place as the are glued and grooved together.
customer_reviews.author: Candace J.

customer_reviews.title: ANNOYED
customer_reviews.text: This box is made really well. It would be perfect in every way, BUT it won't actually close if you have any tea bags standing up. I drink a lot of tea, and I bought this for the purpose of organizing it. I wanted a tea organizer that took away the hassle of sorting through all of my different boxes. The only way to close this box is if you have the bags laying down, which defeats the purpose of buying this box unless you have exactly 8 different types of tea. If this box was just a tiny bit taller it would be perfect. I'm probably going to send it back. :(
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Pewitt

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy quality
customer_reviews.text: I understand why it was only $12. However, I have never received this low of quality item when ordering from amazon, so this is a first bad review for me. The pictures don’t show the dirt and dust that came on it. I tried to clean it up and tighten screws, but it seemed like it was stripped. When you put the tea bags in the box, the cubes around the side won’t allow you to close the top fully, as the top frame is a little wider than the base frame. When opening the lid, it just feels like it’s going to break, it’s flimsy. Hopefully this was just a fluke item, but I am going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: A "natural" tea box shouldn't have a funky chemical odor!
customer_reviews.text: There is certainly nothing "NATURAL" about the funky chemical odor that smacks you in the face as soon as you remove the bubble wrap from this tea box! Even after letting the box air out overnight, it STILL has a very strong chemical smell--inside and out! There is no way I am putting my tea bags inside... I'm guessing they would absorb the odor, and I'm worried about ingesting that same chemical! (A small label on the bottom of the tea box mentions Formaldehyde.)
customer_reviews.author: just_a_girl_in_VA

customer_reviews.title: Great tea box!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my tea. Only issue I’ve had is that if you fill the compartments up all the way with tea bags standing up, the top doesn’t close all the way. You have to lay them flat or not fill the compartments full. Which is fine but I have a variety of tea so I was hoping to be able to stand them up so I could “page through” the tea types rather than just take the top one. Either way this is a lovely box and I’ve gotten many compliments on it! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Lovely clear lid & clean design! No sturdy issues here.
customer_reviews.text: I love the clear lid of this tea box! The ability to see through the lid to make a choice before opening is what attracted me most to buying it. I see other reviewers say that their box have fallen apart or that they have trouble opening the lid but I’ve had it for more than three months now and haven’t had any of those problems. The bamboo doesn’t collect much dust at all and the clear lid doesn’t smudge or leave fingerprints easily either which is great. So far I’ve been really happy with this product! I’ll change this review if I start to have issues with the sturdiness or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Lise

customer_reviews.title: Not only that but it has a foul smell inside
customer_reviews.text: When this product arrived it was already broken in three places and only one of the holes were drilled for the metal prongs to go into in order to allow the box to close completely. Not only that but it has a foul smell inside. I will be returning promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Marie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't buy it so I could fix it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and the magnets in the lid help keep it closed.Able to fit 15 tea bags (Harney, Lipton, Twinings and Celestial brands) with no trouble. much more and lid has difficulty closing. Very functional. The 2-star rating is because to lid was off when it arrived. The 4 screws holding the lid were stripped and laying on the bottom of the box. Seriously doubt this happened during shipment. Some card stock paper and glue later, the screws fit firm and the lid works fine. I didn't buy this tea box so I could fix it before it could be used.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Nourse

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell, NOT suitable for food
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked by how strong and horrible the smell was when I opened this box - it smelled something like formaldehyde, definitely not what I want in any of my food. I let it air out for several days hoping the smell would lessen, but it did not. While the box I received appeared relatively well-crafted for storing things other than food, I would never put food in something that smelled that bad, and certainly not something as delicately flavored as tea. Incredibly disappointed in this product, and strongly recommend against it. Find a product in an actual store - I will not be ordering something like this online again.
customer_reviews.author: s.e.b.

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: This tea box is handsome and beautifully made. While it works well for tea bags, I keep thinking that there are other uses it could be put to, such as storing make up or small toiletries or even sewing supplies or perhaps wee Christmas tree decorations. You'll no doubt come up with your own uses for this box. Right now I'm not feeling creative, so mine just stores tea. Please note the measurements -- the box is larger than it appears to be in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tea box.
customer_reviews.text: It's actually a little bit bigger than I was expecting, but very nice. Sits on my counter and contains all the chaos of the many boxes of tea I had there previously. It does the job I paid for it to do. I love the top being see through so that I know what I have and what I need to replenish. I have more varieties right there on my counter instead of having to sit through my pantry to see what else there is.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Orr

customer_reviews.title: Check the glass first
customer_reviews.text: There was a big scratch across the glass, UNDER the protective plastic. Other than that, it's an efficient way to store a lot of tea bags in packages as long as 1) they fit (some packages are too big) and 2) the package itself is labeled. I wasn't planning on using this on a counter, or giving it as a gift, or I would have gone through the hassle of returning it, but since it was just going to sit in a cupboard, I kept it. But I think quality control is lacking at this company, based on what I got, and other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bamboo storage box.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bamboo box for tea storage. I love the look of it and the quality, and the compartments are the right size for most paper tea packets. The top has a magnetic closure and a divot to open the lid, and the see-through portion of the lid is great for checking how much of a given tea you have remaining. Be careful not to overstuff the compartments.. it can make the lid not want to close, but that's on me for having way too much tea on hand! Very pleased with the box, and I think we'll get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It's nicely made, and is pretty
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little dissapointed in this. It's nicely made, and is pretty. It's larger than I thought it would be, BUT - you cannot "fill" it up. If you have normal tea bags in packages (Like Stash brand) you can't fill the boxes on the edges and still close it. The way the lid fits, if you the edges of the tea packages are right up against the outter edges (they are slightly taller than the box) the lid doesn't shut firmly. I had to turn the tea sideways in those compartments to get them to close. It's a little annoyance, but I did buy the most inexpensive tea box I could find.
customer_reviews.author: LKS

customer_reviews.title: NIce bamboo box
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, loaded it with tea for my DIL for Christmas. I think she will really like it. It's a nice size and has nice quality feel to it. I only paid roughly 12 dollars for it. I went online to buy another the day after I received it to get one for myself and it was 19.25 so I didn't buy another one but it makes a nice presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a tea drinker but my daughter is an addict. I had an entire cabinet taken up by tea bags and loose tea. I got this to help organize her stash and take back my cabinet. It has worked well for the tea bags, obviously it doesn't work for the loose tea, but I have the majority of my cabinet back. Add to that, I've gotten compliments about how nice it looks. For $12, what more can I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: looks amazing/works amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality and price. The price is far less considering what the quality is! It is WELL MADE! Functions perfectly and now that i see how amazing this is, Im buying more to give as gifts! I couldn't have hoped for better. You can stand you tea up or lay them down. I have attached pics ~Thank you for a well made product and at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: mcmichael

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a cheap storage option, surprised by quality.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought 2 of these for my wife and her incredible tea collection. I thought, “hey, I’ll buy a couple cheap boxes and maybe get a little cabinet space back!” When these arrived I was immediately surprised by the quality of the wood and the craftsmanship of these tea boxes. If you’re on the fence, I’d say you can’t go wrong in giving them a try, you might be pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Jkhouri

customer_reviews.title: Take the plastic protector off (lol)
customer_reviews.text: When I received it I thought it was great, but noticed a scratch on the clear window. turns out it was just a plastic protective film and once removed it looked very nice. The thin plastic protection blended in a little too well. I have been happy with the product and have been using it almost daily for my tea assortment.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Reidel

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made, met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift & recipient was happy. Bought a few different teas to add into the compartments, which each hold about 10 individually-wrapped teabags comfortably. I wish I knew where my wood burning kit was because I planned on adding details around the blank spaces to give it extra personalization.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelynn

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and size
customer_reviews.text: I love teas and for years my tea cabinet was a complete mess as I kept collecting them from different sources and randomly arranging them in my cabinet. This box really made a nice job at accommodating all the different flavors I had and I feel it is the perfect size to have a good variety but not being overwhelming. Also great to show off when offering tea to guests.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Galasso

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tea box. The bamboo is very pretty but it also holds so much tea. Its perfect for storing it and just looks really nice. When I first got it I was worried about the clear piece on top breaking because it didn't seem very sturdy, but we have had this tea box for awhile now and it's still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Such a great buy!  Lightweight and as described
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty and worth the $11. Very minimalist, doesn't take up too much room, and seems like it will hold up. My only very small gripe is that my specialty teas that have wider packaging don't fit as well and I can't fit as many as with standard teas. This is a small price to pay, as I still find the product great, and I'm certainly happier with this than similar plastic or crazy expensive products.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, Perfect for Stash Tea
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was a little worried, but this is a wonderful box. It looks very nice, is well built (for the money) and fits normal tea bags like the Stash Tea individually foil wrapped bags perfectly (standing up or laying down). I like the magnet used to hold the top closed and found the top pretty easy to open. The inside did smell like glue when I first opened the box, but I left the top open for 3 hours and no more smell. The bamboo is nicely finished, everyone who sees it comments on how nice it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Αριστείδης

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to consolidate many boxes of different teas. It's not the sturdiest of its kind, but sufficient for my purpose and very attractive. There was no problem of odor with mine, and the protective plastic on the window came off easily. There may be occasional rough spots that one may want to sand down to avoid splinters. Holds quite a lot of tea - especially if the bags are of a size that will 'lie down'. Some tea bags will keep the top from closing completely if they are stood on end.
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea caddy/box, love the style and how much tea it holds!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price! This product is so perfect for keeping a variety of tea bags, wish I'd bought one sooner! I think it's well-constructed enough for what it is, mine came with no flaws. I love the magnetic closure and the little dip on the front edge so you can easily open it. Also you can see that it's tall enough for packaged teabags, lots of them! :)
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Average quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a gift. I didn't like that the lid is made of plastic. I have one that is glass and it is very easy to clean, this one might not. It doesn't have a "nice" look to it. It does the job, but it is not a beautiful piece. I am very picky will my kitchen stuff and like to display it proudly...this is not the kind of item that will do that.
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Well Crafted/Kinda Smells A Bit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! This box will be perfect for me and my tea subscriptions that I receive. Helps me to keep them in order based on the season. At first I didn’t smell what everyone was talking about but after a few minutes I did. I lined the pockets with paper towels to make sure it doesn’t effect the taste of my tea bags. Other than that I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Willis

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2. One to be used for myself for tea and the other for my daughter to store her beautiful rocks and seashells. Hers is in great shape. It had a minor splinter on the bottom of the bamboo and I removed it and it is smooth again. Mine has a side that is loose. I have pushed it back on and intend to super glue it to stay sturdy. The size is perfect and it looks very nice in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Frati

customer_reviews.title: Bargain price, high end quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful item for the price! It holds tea bags for crying out loud. Why do I need to spend $40 when $10 will do the same thing ? I ordered one as a gift for a friend and loved it so much I ordered two for myself, never realizing such a thing even existed. The recipient of it loved it as well . They're very well built. I may save the extra one I got for a Christmas gift, they are just THAT nice.
customer_reviews.author: Venessa

customer_reviews.title: Clearly see your teas in the bix
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea box. I now have 2, because I love them so much. You can fit a box of tea in each slot. You can clearly see tea flavors through glass. I have mine stacked on each other, but also stand them on end next to each other. Keeps teas fresh
customer_reviews.author: Karenia

customer_reviews.title: A good tea box
customer_reviews.text: Each of the eight compartments will hold around ten normal sized tea bags, maybe a few more if you really pack them in. That's plenty for my use. The lid and body fit together nicely and the hinges seem good quality. There is no latch - I selected it in part because I did not want one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Beyard

customer_reviews.title: Great Tea Holder
customer_reviews.text: Since realizing I have a caffeine sensitivity, all coffee and most teas (except rooibos) is no longer an option. I'm just glad to have discovered the terriffic completely caffeine-free herbal teas available now. And taking advantage of the variety. This tea holder is perfect for my various enveloped tea bags. Attractive, substantial, smooth open and close. I like the transparent top to see what I can choose to put in my morning cuppa.
customer_reviews.author: Dubliner

customer_reviews.title: Makes my mornings easier and my kitchen less cluttered
customer_reviews.text: This was a whim purchase but I really like it. I never knew what I was missing. It sure beats those big boxes taking up so much room. I like being able to have a lot of choices right at my fingertips instead of trying to remember what I've got and then digging around for it - especially early in the morning! I've had no problems like others have expressed here. My tea bags fit perfectly but then I just get my tea from the supermarket. I'm very happy with it. Product arrived on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L

customer_reviews.title: 95% good box
customer_reviews.text: The protective covering on the lid wasn’t on it correctly so the lid arrived scratched. Other than the not so sturdy plastic window the box seems well made. I probably cant use this box since the measurements were listed wrong. I got it for a gift and I was going to cover it in floral paper to match a friend’s lost heirloom however since it’s a little longer than 12 inches the paper isn’t long enough. I purposefully was looking for something to fit the paper. If it weren’t for that I’d probably get this damaged one replaced 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! mine had a protective plastic over the lid that I had to gently cut away with a utility knife because some of it was somehow stuck under the wood. but it worked out fine. also the glass in lid is actually plastic....I dont know if that was advertised. But I love it! Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: BeaBooRox

customer_reviews.title: Formaldehyde chemical exposure
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. Smells terrible! Chemical odor is overpowering. If I put tea in this box the tea would taste awful. I feel sick from the fumes. It has a warning on the box for formaldehyde!!
customer_reviews.author: sweetcrik

customer_reviews.title: Not glass but nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice box. I thought it was glass on top but it's plexiglass, also when I got it there was a small crack in the plexiglass. I didn't do a return because I don't want to be bothered with shipping it back and the location of the crack makes it not super visible. Over all a nice box for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product 0 stars I would! When I got the tea box it was falling apart at the joints of the wood and a screw fell out of the hinges when i opened it. I had to use wood glue to mend it! The lid is clear plastic, not glass like I expected. I filled the box with a varitey of teas and my Yogi and Tazo tea bags are too large for the lid to shut right. I'd return it, but honestly it's not worth my trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gad

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer for tea
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to organize tea. We had all of our tea thrown in a basket in a cabinet. I ran into this by accident on Amazon. Decent price point and worked great. I wish it had a clasp or closure for the lid but otherwise loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Michy

customer_reviews.title: Nice tea box
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea box! The compartments hold a good amount of bags. The magnets form a snug closure. The clear window on the lid is a nice touch. The only criticism I have is that one side of the box isn’t finished as smoothly as the others. A little quality control may be in order.
customer_reviews.author: Suri J

customer_reviews.title: I love my tea organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was a little concerned with the possible quality of the tea organizer. I unpacked it and inspected it in great detail. I love it!! It looks classy sitting next to my beautiful tea kettle. The magnets that hold it closed are the perfect strength. The notch in the top provided to open the lid is small enough that it can’t be seen so that it doesn’t take away from the aesthetics of the box. I feel like I got an amazing bargain with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jonalyn Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Simple but nice tea box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a stylish and attractive coffee table type tea box with a pleasant odor. The only minor drawback is that the 'glass' is a little smaller than the hole-cut, so it moves around a bit. Some skillfully placed shims would fix the issue if yours arrives in the same condition.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Heinen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to display and store your teas.
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute and such a good buy!! We absolutely love them. I filled one with our favorite and one with an assortment of many teas. Looks great on display and replaced so many containers I had on the counters and in cabinets. I'm going to order some for crafting, also. I mean really! What a great buy for such a quality item!
customer_reviews.author: CapiJ

customer_reviews.title: Tea box for sealed tea bags
customer_reviews.text: The box was well formed and performs the task well. That said, there is a distinct odor from the bamboo that needs to air out before use. I only put sealed tea bags into the box which limits me a bit as I am unsure how the tea might be affected by the smell. However, the organization, spacing and construction are good. We have been using it daily for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! All your tea in one beautiful box!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Beautiful, smooth bamboo, a clear lid so you can see your tea, and little magnets that keep it snugly closed. Each of the eight compartments can hold up to 12 tea bags, depending on their size. No more dragging out several boxes of tea when guests come over! It's all right there in one sweet little box, saving room in the cupboard by eliminating all those boxes! Yay! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuelle Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea or item for tea lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tea box because it’s see through and holds a lot of tea bags. Great for my house and as a gift to other tea lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Box is nicely packaged and it came intact. Little screws on hinges are not screwed completely, so hinges move back and forth, but considering price one can not expect amazing quality. Dimensions of small compartments are good size and tea-begs fit nicely, however there is a very strong “sour” chemical smell from sealant / finish that was used and I hope it will disappear in couple of days or I will have to return it : (.
customer_reviews.author: nv

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Tea bags don’t fit- lid won’t close.
customer_reviews.text: This item was a bit of a disappointment. Top is cheap plastic not glass- mine arrived scratched and damaged. Cheaply made. Box isn’t tall enough- Lid won’t close if you put more than 5 normal size tea bags (Tazo, Yogi, Bigelow brand) standing up in each compartment. From looking at other reviewers the only way to make this work for tea bag storage is to lay them flat with only first tea bag showing. So not ideal if you need access to last tea bag or if you want to put more than 8 types in he box. Getting a replacement box but kinda wish I hadn’t purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Toms

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Cute way to organize and store tea. If I have guests over, it's much more presentable to have them pick tea from this instead of rummaging through all the boxes and tins of various sizes. Recommended and probably would make a good gift. Also, my girlfriend bought one and said she uses it for her Doterra oils.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H

customer_reviews.title: great for home/office/gift
customer_reviews.text: bought three of these. we keep one at the office and I gave two away. It is simplistic in design and works well. no complaints. I plan to buy another for the house and am toying with the idea of putting a logo on a couple of dozen and giving them as gifts. They are sturdy enough to work with confidence and the inset magnets are great to keep the lid down.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need it to. It is to short so it doesn't close all the way if you put the tea in straight up and down you have to lean them so I can't put as many as I want in the box but it gets the job done. It is flimsy and if I left it out and let my kids grab their herbal teas instead of me it would break quickly.
customer_reviews.author: TinkerbellQueen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic organizer for individually wrapped tea bags. It looks nice and clean. There is a small magnet that keeps the top closed, which is convenient. It holds multiple boxes of tea, allowing for space to organize multiple varieties.
customer_reviews.author: The Gray Guardian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect right out of the box, no assembly required! It’s a lightweight bamboo, so if you’re throwing it around or dropping it, it might break, but it’s perfect for its purpose. The lid is a magnet closure with an acrylic window and the compartments fit standard size tea pouches. It’s a really nice organizer. I was so surprised at the awesome price, because any other bamboo or wood organizer containers are way overpriced! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing tea bags
customer_reviews.text: This box looks great and is an easy way to keep all the teas organized. My one complaint is that the larger tea bags (Tazo sized) all have to be leaned over because the box isn't quite tall enough and they hold the lid up. They don't hit the see through panel but do hit the wooden edge on the lid. It's not a huge deal though and I still use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Birfield85

customer_reviews.title: fancy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I went to Ireland on our honeymoon and I was really impressed with their fancy box display of teas in hotels, restaurants, etc. I had previously stored my tea in a cupboard, usually in the boxes it was bought in. I loved the idea of displaying my tea in a wooden box as they did in Ireland, but did not want to spend a ton doing it. This box is just lovely and looks my tea look fancy on the kitchen counter! Finally, all of those boxes are gone out of the cupboard and my teas get the attention they deserve!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hagenbarth

customer_reviews.title: the glass lid
customer_reviews.text: Great little box for storage I know its a tea box but I love the glass lid and use mine for crafting it holds thread or beads to whatever cross stitch project I am currently working on. I also love that the lid is magnetic so my curious cat can not get it open and get into the threads I have inside.
customer_reviews.author: sandra bunch

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box for More Than Tea Storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my DIL who loves tea. It came in good time and packed well. Would have been nicer with real glass, but the acrylic seems to be fine as long as nothing is put on top to scratch it. The wood is very nice and workmanship is great. The hinges are grubby looking. The little magnet catches work fine. I know she will be happy with this box.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson G. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed... the kid doesn’t close. I didn’t put my tea bags in it and it stays open. Hooray , nice box to hold my tea and stay open I suppose. Bummed. Hoped for better since I’m a tea lover
customer_reviews.author: Country girl

customer_reviews.title: Miss Spiders Tea Party
customer_reviews.text: I opened the taped box, and took off the taped bubble wrap, and found a lovely box. And then inside the lovely box I found spiders. Several small, trapped, alive spiders. This was supposed to be a gift and I was going to just wrap it as is but I'm glad I opted not to! Horrifying to open - also other reviews show it doesn't close all the way which seems like a dumb design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: soritakashi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this.  I use it as a spice box to set near cooking area
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use a a spice box. I like to have a box next to the stove to just add "pinches" of flavoring with my fingers. This is great. The cubbies are very deep. It is a nice quality box. I love it. I also purchased the set of 10 "palm wood small spoons" that are very tiny and fit perfectly in each cubby!! :)
customer_reviews.author: FSB67

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer has Quality Control issues with this Bamboo Tea Box...Had to return both boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Though I liked the design, I found manufacturer quality control lacking since 1 box had wood splintered inside of the box and the replacement box had a large scratched mark on top of acrylic plastic window. I gave up after 2 tries as it is not worth my time to fiddle with such subpar products. I did not like the fact that the manufacturer also put pieces of bamboo on 2 of the 4 sides and they don't always line up so it gives a look/feel of unevenness around the acrylic plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Fresno

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted, but not all packets fit
customer_reviews.text: The box came as expected and definitely serves its purpose ~ easy access and nice display of teas; however, not all tea packets fit! I got gifted a set of tea for Christmas and they fit if you turn them sideways but they are too tall for the slot so I had to fold the top or lean them in order for the lid to close. Still works for me and I’m glad I purchased it! (Also makes for a good gift!)
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Tea Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely tea box. Well crafted, and with quality materials, I had no problem with the box being unhinged or imbalanced in any way. The glass cover was perfect and it easily fits 100+ tea bags inside. The box is tremendously convenient in having all my tea (well, most of it) in one easy storage item that's attractive as well. I've been thinking about buying another for some small craft items because I'm so pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C/S Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great tea box just pay attention to dimensions
customer_reviews.text: This box is a nice quality tea box. Feels sturdy. The only down side is that with the tea bags I buy if I stack them close together and fill the whole square the lid will not shut all the way. I did not think to measure that when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Lid has a gap
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Lid is not glass, it's is clear plexiglass. After putting all my tea bags in the box the lid does not close all the way. I have varies brands of tea and the bags are all the same size. Lid stays open by 1/4" bummer.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bamboo tea box............
customer_reviews.text: I recently received the bamboo tea box quick delivery, Great packaging. I love the tea box it looks neater oppose to all the tea boxes I had. Now it is very organized and you can see through glass lid. Please order you won't be disappointed. M.H.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Practical and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo is beautiful and study. This tea box will remain in in excellent condition due to the nature of bamboo. The box has plenty of space for tea bags, but does not take up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I love it! We built a little tea station and this was the perfect addition. It is well made. It fits several packs. Make it easy to organize my varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Terin

customer_reviews.title: High quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I was actually kind of shocked at the quality of this tea box. It feels and looks really expensive. All of the compartments were the perfect size for tea bags.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Proton

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally disappointed with this tea box. It looks nice, but it arrived with several cracks and numerous scratches across the plastic face of the box. This immediately makes it feel like a cheap box, which I suppose is fitting given the low price point. That's the only reason this is getting 2 stars rather than 1 - at less than $15, it's hard to complain, but I would still prefer to at least receive the product in proper condition. You get what you pay for, in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Tea box
customer_reviews.text: For the price I wasn't expecting a whole lot, but I was really surprised at how awesome this tea box, I just love it. Note -that it can be used for many things not just teas.
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.  Holds about 116 average sized tea bags! Quality & Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: This was far cheaper than the others I found online, and better quality. You can fit about 12-18 tea bags depending on thickhess in each slot, so a little over 100 in the box. Magnetic. Looks great on the kitchen counter and for serving. Lid opens backwards about 150 degrees. I hot-glue gunned a ceramic miniature tea-set onto the top (acrylic, not glass top see-thru lid), and it makes a really cute shabby chic teabox for under $20. Great gift. Not just for display for for real storage of over 100 tea bags!
customer_reviews.author: I Buy Way Too Much STUFF!

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So this a standard tea box and can fit about 8-10 bags per section. I had been using an old Lipton box to hold all of tea bags for so long and need to get a real one since that box was falling apart. This is great for cheap and easy buy. Simple craftsman’s ship and I think I can stain the wood if needed. Great for someone that doesn’t need anything too fancy because it’s a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sonal Mistry

customer_reviews.title: so pretty
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a box so I can put my tea's I buy some extra so this box is really pretty and I can see the tea that I want the only thig the top part is plastic, but is worth it the bamboo color is really nice I love it
customer_reviews.author: Estrella Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Molds over if home is not air conditioned and hot & muggy
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice box and i do reccomend it. However, be careful if you live in a house with no air conditioning as when i moved to my new home with no air conditioning. When it got hot & humid it caused my box to mold over. Particularly where i had the type of tea bags without paper or foil wrappers. So just be careful as to how you use it and you will be fine. Unfortunately i had to get rid of mine as it molded through too much. But most likely i will ordering a replacement now that we have a.c. and my home is more temperature regulated. So great product but just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Nice box for tea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to house all the tea I got when I ordered the 58 Count variety pack of Organic Yogi Tea. it didn't come in a box and I wanted to be able to look through them easily. This is a cute little wooden box, a little flimsy but great for a first time tea drinker like me. (PS I really liked the Yogi tea)
customer_reviews.author: l

customer_reviews.title: This arrived in good condition, and for the price is perfectly acceptable
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in good condition, and for the price is perfectly acceptable. I'll likely buy another to store extra tea in since if you want the lid to close it doesn't hold too many bags. As others have mentioned, the plastic film got stuck and required a blade to remove, but it took just a couple of minutes. Not the highest quality, but perfectly acceptable for storage given the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize teas
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Now all my teas are organized. The only thing I would add would be a way to label the teas in each cube since not all teas come individually packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Teabag Sizes Matter!
customer_reviews.text: This bow is wonderful for standard sized tea bags. Any tea bags that are just a few millimeters large will not fit in the outer squares as the lif will not shut. Any teabags more than a few millimeters more than standard will not fit in this box leaving you with teabags unorganized out side of the box -the reason you buy the box in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Nick A. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Holds a lot of varieties for easy viewing. Eliminated the stacks of tea boxes in the pantry that were always falling and getting scrambling up.
customer_reviews.author: Shelving

customer_reviews.title: beautiful tea box
customer_reviews.text: My hubby really like this tea box. He ONLY drinks Lipton...lol It fits at least 120 bags! He felt it was a little cumbersome to open in. So I used construction adhesive and added a $2.50 knob I got at Hobby Lobby. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharron

customer_reviews.title: Nice box
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son because he is a heavy tea drinker. This box went well with a variety of tea bags that I also bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: TD Puyallup, WA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing organizer for teas
customer_reviews.text: I adore this tea container. I love how many teabags I can fit into each cubby and I love that the lid is transparent. Such a nice way to keep a variety of teas organized
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with the glass not cut properly. It was sliding around in the glass placement. There were some wood pieces poking out. Needs to be sanded down more.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better glue for the magnetic latch
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be about a quarter of an inch deeper to fit the specialty teas, envelopes. I can only put smaller, store-bought teas in it to shut. Needs a better glue for the magnetic latch. Mine both came apart when I opened the box the first time. But it won't shut all the way with the specialty tea bags in it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a tea drinker and this terrific box puts all her favorite teas into one convenient place. We have given this as a gift too. The big tea companies ought use this as a gift (or purchase) with purchase item.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shereshewsky

customer_reviews.title: This is such a nice way to store my tea
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice way to store my tea! I don't have a huge collection, but I was really happy with how much it holds. The clear top is nice because all of your teas are on display. It doesn't fit my Teavana tea bags, but those are extra wide so I was expecting that. It fits all of my standard-sized tea bags nicely.
customer_reviews.author: K. Salvati

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a 4 because the first one was made better than the second one
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Fits most teabags but could be about 1/4 inch higher if you want to stand the teabags up instead of laying them flat. Depends on tea packaging. Gave it a 4 because the first one was made better than the second one. Nothing I can't fix with a screwdriver, a little dab of glue and maybe hit some of the edges with sandpaper. What my dad would call "holidays" in the areas we did not do a perfect job waxing the car or cutting the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Chai

customer_reviews.title: Good buy if you can get a deal.
customer_reviews.text: Solid tea storage box. Nothing exciting, does the job well. Wish it had a handle or something for opening. Bought as an open box deal at a reduced rate, wouldn't have paid more.
customer_reviews.author: SarahElle

customer_reviews.title: Compartments Not a Big as Hoped
customer_reviews.text: Good little box. Each compartment is a bit to small so the tea pack has to lay back, but maybe it's that way on purpose? However, I bought it for tea storage, and each square doesn't hold too many bags, maybe 5-6 before they stand up too tall to close the lid. But still a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: There's a bit of a tight fit at the top if the teas are standing straight up but that's super minor. I really like it, esp given the average price for similar products. Btw, I cut part of the tea name off of my celestial seasonings tea boxes so I can remember which teas are which.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkerBelle

customer_reviews.title: Finally Organized Our Teas
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little tea box at a wonderful price. It's fun taking this box out when we have company - like being in a fancy restaurant! So glad our teas are finally in one place and easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: J Row

customer_reviews.title: Helpful box!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big tea fun so this product is super helpful. The top is plastic not glass but it’s a good quality. There is also magnets to keep the top from falling open. My local bakery also has one. I would for sure recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Jzyk

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little deeper
customer_reviews.text: I bought two because the price is a steal for what you get. I use one for tea and one for incense cones. It fits most of my tea bags but some are a little taller than the box is deep.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish on this tea box are first class. I am trying to figure out what else I can store in one of these just to have an excuse to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea box but it arrived damaged. A piece of the wood frame under the glass was hanging off. We glued it back on and it seems to be holding up okay. Disappointed in the quality/durability but otherwise a beautiful and functional tea box.
customer_reviews.author: N.K.

customer_reviews.title: Make it fancy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and it was a simple but effect way for my gift recipient to organizer her tea. It made her feel fancy. Was a great hostess gift.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Kroy

customer_reviews.title: but when I put my husbands teabags in there it turned out to be perfect. When I presented it to my husband he ...
customer_reviews.text: This box is bigger than I had expected, but when I put my husbands teabags in there it turned out to be perfect. When I presented it to my husband he loved it. He uses it everyday and when he buys a new box of teabags he places them all in his new tea box.
customer_reviews.author: Aleda N. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: this is a fantastic price for this item
customer_reviews.text: this is a fantastic price for this item. I was surprised at how well this item was made and am so happy I decided to purchase it! I'm debating on getting a second one because you can use it for a lot of things. Nice smooth surface. Plexy glass window. The hinges are delicate but unless your an ogre or super clumbsy your not going to break it. Great find!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kate

product_meta.title: Oceanstar Bamboo Tea Box, 12 Inch, Natural
product_meta.description: Keep your tea collection and assortment organized with the Oceanstar bamboo tea box Made from 100-Percent bamboo. The practical tea box can also act as storage for an array of items such as crafts, screws, small supplies and other small collections. Impress your friends and family with this wonderfully crafted tea box for your home or present it as the perfect gift for tea lovers.
feature_bullets: Bamboo framed lid with acrylic glass for easy viewing
Functional and versatile to hold and organize any small accessories or store collections

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,355 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
